model_outputs.model_answer:

2. because he had a rare skin condition: This clause modifies the verb "was referred", and it indicates the reason why the patient was referred to the specialist. In this case, the pronoun "he" refers to the patient.
Therefore, the answer is (A) The patient had a skin condition.
